name: part_005
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Machine Gun Talk' by Shirogane Noel and Tsunomaki Watame.
MC segment where Shirogane Noel and Tsunomaki Watame discuss their shared love for the band Porno Graffitti.

subtitles.original: ちょっとやそっとじゃ止まらない君のマシンガントーク
subtitles.english: Your machine-gun talk won't stop for a little or a lot

subtitles.original: 時々迷惑に感じるくらい
subtitles.english: To the point where I sometimes feel it's a nuisance

subtitles.original: Please please don't disturb me
subtitles.english: Please please don't disturb me

subtitles.original: そんじょそこらの男たちには手にも負えないレベルの
subtitles.english: At a level that ordinary men can't handle

subtitles.original: You're my honey
subtitles.english: You're my honey

subtitles.original: 僕にはわかってるんだよ
subtitles.english: I know it,

subtitles.original: それが君の愛のカタチ
subtitles.english: that's your form of love

subtitles.original: どんなに小さな出来事だって
subtitles.english: Even the smallest event,

subtitles.original: Please please tell me all about YOU
subtitles.english: Please please tell me all about YOU

subtitles.original: 世界中の誰よりもずっと君のこと知っていたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to know about you more than anyone else in the world

subtitles.original: シャワーのように降りかかる言葉の雨に打たれていたい
subtitles.english: I want to be struck by the rain of words falling like a shower

subtitles.original: GOOD TIME BAD TIME
subtitles.english: GOOD TIME BAD TIME

subtitles.original: いろいろあるけれど It's all right
subtitles.english: There's a lot of things, but It's all right

subtitles.original: キスして抱きしめてる時だけはホントに静かだね
subtitles.english: Only when we kiss and hug, you're really quiet

subtitles.original: I want you want
subtitles.english: I want you want

subtitles.original: これ以上スキになるとヤバイ
subtitles.english: It'll be bad if I like you any more than this

subtitles.original: 離れられない
subtitles.english: I can't leave

subtitles.original: ランチの合間も止まらない君のマシンガントーク
subtitles.english: Your machine-gun talk won't stop even during lunch

subtitles.original: 冷めたコーヒーで乾きを潤し
subtitles.english: Wetting your dry throat with cold coffee,

subtitles.original: Please please tell me all about YOU
subtitles.english: Please please tell me all about YOU

subtitles.original: まるでコンタクトレンズのように君とずっと一緒にいるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm with you all the time, just like a contact lens

subtitles.original: 疲れた心癒す言葉の海に溺れていたい
subtitles.english: I want to drown in the sea of words that heals my tired heart

subtitles.original: GOOD TIME BAD TIME
subtitles.english: GOOD TIME BAD TIME

subtitles.original: いろいろあるけれど It's OK
subtitles.english: There's a lot of things, but It's OK

subtitles.original: ケンカや誤解や仲直りホントに忙しいね
subtitles.english: Fighting, misunderstanding, and making up, we're really busy

subtitles.original: I want you want
subtitles.english: I want you want

subtitles.original: 大切なトキを二人で過ごそう
subtitles.english: Let's spend precious time together

subtitles.original: 離れたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to leave

subtitles.original: 見えるものだけ信じちゃだめだよ
subtitles.english: Don't believe only what you can see.

subtitles.original: 見えないものを見なきゃだめだよ
subtitles.english: You must see what you can't see

subtitles.original: 聞こえることだけ信じるよりも
subtitles.english: Rather than believing only what you can hear,

subtitles.original: 聞こえないことを聴いてかなきゃ
subtitles.english: you must listen to what you can't hear

subtitles.original: 言葉の裏側に隠されてる真実がちゃんと見えてるかい
subtitles.english: Can you see the truth hidden behind the words clearly?

subtitles.original: そういうこと忘れずにいれば
subtitles.english: If you keep that in mind...

subtitles.original: GOOD TIME BAD TIME
subtitles.english: GOOD TIME BAD TIME

subtitles.original: いろいろあるけれど It's all right
subtitles.english: There's a lot of things, but It's all right

subtitles.english: Only when we kiss and hug, you're really quiet

subtitles.english: GOOD TIME BAD TIME

subtitles.english: There's a lot of things, but It's OK

subtitles.original: ケンカや誤解や仲直りホントに忙しいね
subtitles.english: Fighting, misunderstanding, and making up, we're really busy

subtitles.original: I want you want
subtitles.english: I want you want

subtitles.original: 大切なトキを二人で過ごそう
subtitles.english: Let's spend precious time together

subtitles.original: 離れたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to leave

subtitles.original: あい〜！あい〜！
subtitles.english: Ai~! Ai~!

subtitles.original: わためー、今日は来ていただきありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Watame, thank you for coming today!

subtitles.original: こちらこそありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much too!

subtitles.original: いやーね、もう、はい。
subtitles.english: Well, yeah, okay.

subtitles.original: 団長、はい。
subtitles.english: Danchou, yes.

subtitles.original: 何で呼ばれたんだろう、うん。
subtitles.english: Why was I called, yeah.

subtitles.original: えっとね、今日は、あの団長ね、ずっとずっとそのわためとね、歌って踊りたかった曲があって。
subtitles.english: Um, today, Danchou had a song that I've wanted to sing and dance with Watame for a long, long time.

subtitles.original: いや、わため、ま、さっきね、歌ったからちょっとわかると思うけど、ちょっとそれは一瞬忘れて、
subtitles.english: Well, Watame, we just sang it so you might know, but let's forget that for a moment,

subtitles.original: え、わためって好きなアーティストさん誰かな？
subtitles.english: Um, Watame, who is your favorite artist?

subtitles.original: えっと、ポルノグラフィティです！
subtitles.english: Um, it's Porno Graffitti!

subtitles.original: そうだね。ライブも見てたもんね。
subtitles.english: That's right. You were watching the live too.

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: で、団長も実はポルノグラフィティ好きなんだよ。
subtitles.english: And Danchou actually likes Porno Graffitti too.

subtitles.original: なにっ！？
subtitles.english: What!?

subtitles.original: なんだってー！
subtitles.english: What did you say!?

subtitles.original: まあ！
subtitles.english: My!
